services.name: C1 Visa - Tourism
services.description: Tourism, visiting friends/family, MICE participant; initial 60 days + 2x60d extensions (max 180d).

services.name: C2 Visa - Business
services.description: Business-related activities, meetings, shopping, inspections; 60d + 2x60d (max 180d).

services.name: C7 Visa
services.description: Professionals invited to events; 30d, not extendable.

services.name: C7A Visa (Music Performance)
services.description: Exhibit/show/perform music-related work; 30d, not extendable.

services.name: C7B Visa (Music Support)
services.description: Supporting foreigners in musical performance activities; 30d, not extendable.

services.name: C22A Visa - Academy Internship
services.description: Internship to fulfill academic requirements; 60d or 180d, not extendable.

services.name: C22B Visa - Company Internship
services.description: Internship within a company; 60d or 180d, not extendable.

services.name: D1 Visa - Meetings/Tourism
services.description: MICE/tourism/visiting; each visit 60d; up to 180d per visit.

services.name: D2 Visa - Business
services.description: Business, meetings, shopping; each visit 60d; up to 180d per visit.

services.name: D12 Visa - Business Investigation
services.description: Site visits, surveys, feasibility studies; up to 180d; extendable once.

services.name: Freelance KITAS (E23)
services.description: Work & stay up to 6 months without specific employer.

services.name: Working KITAS (E23)
services.description: 1 year under a company; multiple entry.

services.name: Investor KITAS (E28A)
services.description: For foreign investors (PT PMA).

services.name: Dependent KITAS (E31B & E31E)
services.description: Dependents of KITAS/long-stay holders.

services.name: Retirement KITAS (E33F)
services.description: Age 55+, 1 year, multiple entry.

services.name: Spouse KITAS (E31A)
services.description: Married to Indonesian citizen; 1/2 years, multiple entry.

services.name: Remote Worker KITAS (E33G)
services.description: Digital nomads; 1 year, multiple entry.

services.name: Investor KITAP
services.description: Investor KITAP (5 years).

services.name: Working KITAP
services.description: BOD/BOC after 3 years Working KITAS; 5 years.

services.name: Family KITAP
services.description: Family KITAP (5 years).

services.name: Retirement KITAP
services.description: Retirement KITAS 4+ years; 5 years.

services.name: Set Up Company (PT PMA)
services.description: Company setup, permits and licenses.

services.name: Alcohol License
services.description: Alcohol Class A/B/C + NPPBKC license.

services.name: Legal Real Estate
services.description: Due diligence, feasibility, contracting, transaction.
